thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great for ExCeL business trips
thread.title_full: Great for ExCeL business trips - Review of Premier Inn London Docklands (Excel) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Danielle W
title: Great for ExCeL business trips
text:
8 of us stayed here for a business trip in March 2017. Over all the experience was pleasant. Our double room had a double bed as well as a single, was cleaned daily to a good standard and had a great shower etc.
One night we wanted to eat in the hotel as we were tired from a full day of work however the restaurant was fully booked for an hour and a half & the staff wouldn't let us sit in the 'breakfast area' of the restaurant as the tables were set for the following morning. I understand this reason but it was a bit of a shame to be turned away as we had to go across to the Hilton - which was actually lovely and would highly recommend!
Breakfast was delicious with a great choice - including crumpets, which I love - but we are yet to try the normal menu!
Great location for business however we didn't venture much further than the Chinese nearby.
